languages.text: {n}Помрачнев, Арджента печально произносит:{/n} "Я не согласна с тобой, но я клялась сопровождать тебя и оберегать. И клятву эту я не нарушу даже здесь, в логове богохульных тварей".

{n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."
languages.original_text: {n}Помрачнев, Арджента печально произносит:{/n} "Я не согласна с тобой, но я клялась сопровождать тебя и оберегать. И клятву эту я не нарушу даже здесь, в логове богохульных тварей".

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得黯淡下来，她哀伤地开了口。{/n}“虽然我不同意你的看法，但我已经发过誓要陪伴你，守护你。即使是在这里，在这个难以启齿的亵渎之地，我也不会违背我的誓言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得黯淡下来，她哀伤地开了口。{/n}“虽然我不同意你的看法，但我已经发过誓要陪伴你，守护你。即使是在这里，在这个难以启齿的亵渎之地，我也不会违背我的誓言。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情は暗くなり、悲しげに言った。{/n}「あなたの判断には同意できないが、あなたと共に歩み、お守りすると誓った。このような冒涜の巣窟で、その誓いを破るつもりはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情は暗くなり、悲しげに言った。{/n}「あなたの判断には同意できないが、あなたと共に歩み、お守りすると誓った。このような冒涜の巣窟で、その誓いを破るつもりはない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se oscurece y declara con tristeza:{/n} «Aunque no estoy de acuerdo, he jurado acompañarl{mf|e|a} y protegerl{mf|e|a}. Ni tan siquiera aquí, en este antro de profanidad indescriptible, faltaré a mi palabra».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se oscurece y declara con tristeza:{/n} «Aunque no estoy de acuerdo, he jurado acompañarl{mf|e|a} y protegerl{mf|e|a}. Ni tan siquiera aquí, en este antro de profanidad indescriptible, faltaré a mi palabra».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Je ne suis pas d'accord, mais j'ai juré de vous accompagner et de vous protéger, {n}reconnaît-elle sur un ton lugubre.{/n} Je ne romprai pas mon serment, même dans cet antre d'infamie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Je ne suis pas d'accord, mais j'ai juré de vous accompagner et de vous protéger, {n}reconnaît-elle sur un ton lugubre.{/n} Je ne romprai pas mon serment, même dans cet antre d'infamie. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich, und sie sagt traurig:{/n} "Ich bin zwar anderer Meinung, habe aber geschworen, dass ich Euch begleite und beschütze. Ich werde diesen Schwur selbst hier in diesem Pfuhl unaussprechlicher Gottlosigkeit nicht brechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich, und sie sagt traurig:{/n} "Ich bin zwar anderer Meinung, habe aber geschworen, dass ich Euch begleite und beschütze. Ich werde diesen Schwur selbst hier in diesem Pfuhl unaussprechlicher Gottlosigkeit nicht brechen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor, kederle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Fikirlerine katılmasam da sana eşlik etmeye ve seni korumaya yemin ettim. Bu alçaklık yuvasında bile yemini bozmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "Although I disagree, I have sworn to accompany you and protect you. I will not break that oath even here, in this den of unspeakable profanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor, kederle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Fikirlerine katılmasam da sana eşlik etmeye ve korumaya yemin ettim. Yeminimi bu ağza alınmaz küfürlerin yuvasında bile bozmayacağım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
